Publisher: Published by Giovanni Giacomo De Rossi (Rome 1627–1691 Rome)
Heilbrunn Timeline of Art History: The Idea and Invention of the Villa
From Italy to France Gardens in the Court of Louis XIV and After
Description: Title page, dedication and 33 plates of the series 'Le Fontane di Roma' showing the main fountains and sources of water in and around the city of Rome. Bound with 'Le Fontane delle Ville di Frascati nel Tuscolano' and the first, second and third book of 'Il Nuovo Teatro delle Fabbriche, et Edificii, in Prospettiva di Rome Moderna (...)'.
